DESCRIPTION: An enemy with Blind will deal 50% less damage with attacks. Does not stack with Weak.
If an enemy with Charm would attack, it attacks a random monster instead.
An enemy with Choke loses 3 HP whenever you play a card.
While you have Choking Grasp, all enemies lose 3 HP whenever you play a card.
If an enemy with Confuse would attack, it will attack a random monster instead.
After 3 turns, kill a non-boss, non-elite enemy. Deals 50 damage after 3 turns instead to boss or elite.
An enemy with Immobilize cannot gain Block.
An enemy with Sleep cannot act. Will wake when attacked. If Sleep wears off without being woken, heals to full and gains 4 Strength.
An enemy with Slow takes 10% more damage for each card played during the turn.
Each enemy may only be Stolen from 1 time.
A throwing weapon is a 0-cost attack. There are six different weapons with various effects.
An enemy with Silence cannot inflict debuffs.
